name: A Moon of Cheese
description:
Overview

After many months of being a lab mouse, the experiments have had the most wonderful side effect: enhanced intelligence. Each night, tucked away in your cage in the laboratory, you stare up into the sky longingly at the big ball of cheese - something the other, less intelligent mice haven't even noticed.

Another thing you noticed from the window was the big tubes that this place you're in fires at the ball of cheese. It disappears before you see it get there, but you just know that's where it's going.

Maybe you can sneak onto one and have the big ball of cheese in the sky all to yourself...


Known Issues:
  • Linux/Mac builds are untested and may be unstable.
  • Controllers aren't supported and will cause gameplay issues if used, particularly with jump height.

Change Log:

v1.0.1: Changed zip compression to allow installation via itch.io app.
